description: Focus on learning to create web-based, mobile and desktop-based applications using the programming languages PHP, C++ and Java. The applications I have made include online shops, car rentals, school library system managers, and many more

Focus on studying and preparing for a career in website and mobile development using the Javascript programming language for 3 months. The stack that was studied included Reactjs, React Native, Expressjs, Redux, and many more. Build a team to complete movie ticket booking projects and digital wallets based on websites and mobile.
